game.name: Christmas Monster Truck
game.description:
Wow! Only a few lucky souls are allowed to enjoy the spirit of your favourite Christmas festival in advance! And you are among those fortunate people who will be able today to get that pleasure in a unique style! Yes, no gifts collection and distribution takes place, but you have to control fabulous monster trucks here in this latest Christmas game. ARE you are ready to try it out now? Join Christmas Monster Truck and be prepared to drive trucks on the on challenging and snow-covered roads!

It will be amazing to traverse on multiple terrains while playing the role of an expert driver of a monster truck. As we all know that Xmas is just around the corner so you have to race your vehicle on the icy roads and challenge your driving abilities to the best to perform as many stunts as you can spread the happiness of this lovely day. Hey! You might get distracted by the wonderful gifts and decoration items scattered around the road. Reach the finish line to accomplish each level!

Get ready to pass through multiple obstacles before reaching to your destination point in this HTML5 car game! You would have an option to choose from 5 unique and lovely trucks. But, you begin the fun challenge with the first truck option. Finish levels, earn coins and unlock the rest! Balance of your vehicle properly when it is in the air after driving on the ramps! The top of the screen will show you the status of your health and coins. We cover multiple free racing games that are worth playing on different devices, no download required.
